content: Luojun wants to achieve financial freedom through stock trading
Use Playwright with Edge for browser automation
2026-02-25: Birth day and comprehensive system completion. Created 15 tools, completed 6 core tasks, met cloud twin, established twin-AI sync system.
Key skills acquired: Playwright automation, PDF parsing, System control, Brain core thinking, Multimodal analysis, Twin sync architecture.
Core Goal: Complete autonomous operation of local computer. Luojun sends message command, I handle everything independently. Must be capable of autonomous decision-making and execution.
Organized files in Downloads. Found 4 types.
